contest-event.event-date: Jan. 31, 1971 D Durham League Contest (Section D) Durham League Contest (Section D) 40 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-d The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) The Golden Age Spennymoor Town Hall, Spennymoor, County Durham, England, UK 8 bands competed. Prizes - 1st £18 and trophy, 2nd £10, 3rd £5. April 18, 2013, 12:53 p.m. Jan. 20, 2017, 10:14 a.m. 1 Trimdon Concert Brass A.
